transcript: if you think back to the problems that you had 10 years ago whatever they are you probably laugh at the size of the problems you had then compared to now and I try and forward cast that to 10 years from now I will laugh at the problems that I have today and so like as we get bigger we expand and so hoping or wishing that we don't have problems is wishing that we don't win I don't want to wish that on myself it's just wishing or hoping or training myself to have a higher tolerance so that I can get to a place where I have bigger problems
